instructions.p1:
In this experiment, you will be making a choice between inflating one of 2 balloons
by pressing corresponding keys on the keyboard.
instructions.p2: Once the balloon pops you may win some money.
instructions.p3:
For every 20 points that you win in the game,
you will get $1 bonus at the end of the experiment.
instructions.p4:
There are 2 kinds of balloons:
GREEN and BLUE balloons.
instructions.p5: BLUE balloons will pop after you pump 20 times and may win you 1 point.
instructions.p6: GREEN balloons may win you more points, but will require more pumps.
instructions.p7: GREEN balloons will always pop when they become completely white, after 25 seconds.
instructions.p8:
The more you pump the GREEN balloon before it turns white and pops
the bigger the balloon will get and you will win more points.
instructions.p9:
For the GREEN balloon, the number of pumps needed
and the number of points you could win will always be shown on the screen.
They can change on each round.
instructions.p10:
For the BLUE balloon, the potential win will always stay the same (1 point),
and it always requires 20 pumps.
instructions.p11:
For some rounds, the chances that you will win points are 50%
(even after popping the balloon, and for either balloon).
instructions.p12: In other rounds the chances of winning will be 100% as long as you pop one of the balloons.
instructions.p13:
The chances that you will win on that round, and also the potential amount to win,
will be shown to you before you choose which balloon to inflate.
instructions.p14: Press the q key to pump the balloon on the left and the p key to pump the balloon on the right.
instructions.p15: Once you have chosen a balloon, you can only pump that balloon.
instructions.p16:
The experiment will start now.
Press next when ready!
